alert.note: Alert for Adams; Broomfield; Denver; Jefferson (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 2:21PM MDT until May 26 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Broomfield County in northeastern Colorado... West central Denver County in northeastern Colorado... Northeastern Jefferson County in central Colorado... West central Adams County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 300 PM MDT. * At 221 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arvada, or 12 miles northwest of Denver, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Arvada around 230 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include southwestern Broomfield, Westminster, Northglenn and Federal Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
